diff_act: 1.offer a unique graphical user interface for editing documents

regen.new_specification: The GUI shall provide users the ability to assign names to documents during the editing process.
The GUI shall allow the user to assign a name to the document before saving.
The document must be given a name by the user before saving to reflect its relationship contextually and to facilitate easy retrieval by name in future.

label: The user may optionally specify a descriptive name for the document.
